main event: Two California physicians on vacation in Spain observed a flat disc-like object in the sky for 1 minute and 30 seconds.
interesting points: The sighting took place under clear conditions with good visibility., The object was seen moving from NW to NE., Witnesses reported the object was metallic and larger than typical aircraft., The object emitted no sound during its flight., The sighting was reported to officials the same evening it occurred.
sighted object: a flat disc-like object in the sky
